title: First Amendment Information

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Prohibit the processing of information describing how any individual exercises rights guaranteed by the First Amendment unless expressly authorized by statute or by the individual or unless pertinent to and within the scope of an authorized law enforcement activity.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: The [PRIVACT] limits agencies’ ability to process information that describes how individuals exercise rights guaranteed by the First Amendment. Organizations consult with the senior agency official for privacy and legal counsel regarding these requirements.

group_title: Personally Identifiable Information Processing and Transparency
